title: Author Information
text:
Krishna




I am a data scientist with a passion for analyzing and visualizing data to uncover insights and drive decision-making. With a background in statistics and machine learning, I enjoy solving complex problems and delivering actionable solutions.






Actuarial Society of Nepal
Kathmandu, Nepal
July 2022 – Present





Principal Risk Consulting
Kathmandu, Nepal
December 2022 – Present





eBeema
Kathmandu, Nepal
June 2022 - August 2023





IGI Prudential General Insurance
Kathmandu, Nepal
October 2021 – June 2022





Numeric Mind
Kathmandu, Nepal
July 2020 - December 2020






Bachelor in Mathematical Science (Actuarial Science)

Tribhuvan University
Kathmandu, Nepal
2017 – 2021
Cumulative GPA: 2.68/4
Additional Courses:

Research Paper: Estimating R Number for Nepal: Key Indicator for Covid-19 Situation. This Research was awarded as the winner of Institute of Faculty of Actuaries hackathon 2021.
Relevant coursework: Predicting Air Quality of Kathmandu using SVM Model and Misinformation in Covid-19 Crisis
Certified as Data Analyst Professional in 2023
Finalist in “Kislay Actuarial Education Hackathon 2020”







Software Tools: Excel | R | VBA | SQL | Python | git
Actuarial Principles: Employee Benefit Valuation | IBNR Reserving | Own Risk Solvency
Communication: Written and Oral communication: English, Nepali, Newari





Institute of Faculty of Actuaries (IFOA)

CS1, CM1, CB1, CB2, CB3, CP3, Stage1

Data Camp

Data Analyst with R Track [77 hrs.]
Data Scientist with R Track [88 hrs.]

World Bank Training

Risk Based Capital training
Own Risk Solvency training






Sports: Football and Cricket
Traveling: Especially hiking
Music: Especially lo-fi genre





Email: krishnakumarshrestha00@gmail.com
LinkedIn: Connect with me
